description: This file configures ESLint extensions using the @eslint/eslintrc FlatCompat utility, setting up ESLint configuration for a Next.js project with core web vitals and TypeScript support.

methods.name: File Scope
methods.description: Defines constants for the current filename and directory based on the module URL for resolving relative paths.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Generates an array of extended ESLint configurations based on provided configuration names.
